paper_abstract: An algorithm for computing the maximum area empty isothetic orthoconvex polygon among a set of n points on a 2D rectangular region, is presented. The worst-case time and space complexities of the proposed algorithm are O(n(3)) and O(n(2)) respectively. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Recognition of largest empty orthoconvex polygon in a point set
